title: How Do You Handle Contributions and Changes
content: How do you handle contributions and changes? - The Design System Guide Close Design system # How do you handle contributions and changes? Romina Kavcic Here are tips for managing changes and contributions ### Best practices Criteria for accepting new components or changes Develop a structured process for contributions Have regular meetings Cross-functional collaboration + regular reviews History log Version control Have documentation Share changes and updates across the org ### Example Nord Health uses a hybrid approach where a central design system team oversees the overall direction, but product teams can propose new features The process typically involves: Contribution proposal Kick-off meeting Design change review Publishing changes This model balances centralized governance with community input, allowing for flexibility while maintaining consistency. üîó Read the full interview [https://thedesignsystem.guide/interview-ariel-salminen] ### Design System Contribution Models üîó Check more contribution models [https://uxplanet.org/design-system-contribution-models-42b493a2ddb1] Next question I need a list of design system metrics Published on: Nov 14, 2024 Updated: Updated: Nov 14, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic.
